attributes.action: get any housing associations to house people with children asap within at least 6 months instead of years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am wanting to start a petition for those people that have children and are living in poor conditions (E.G overcrowded), especially people with infants as i myself are waiting for a 2 bedroomed house my son is 1 been on council list since may 2006 and need somewhere as soon as possible as he needs his own room and i my self need my independance i am living with my mother and 2 brothers in a 3 bed house and is too overcrowded so i want to help many people in the same situation as me.
